name: mcp-server-cloudflare
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) is a [new, standardized protocol](https://modelcontextprotocol.io/introduction) for managing context between large language models (LLMs) and external systems. In this repository, we provide an installer as well as an MCP Server for [Cloudflare's API](https://api.cloudflare.com).

prompts.name: Deploy a new Worker
prompts.description: Create a new Cloudflare Worker with a Durable Object
prompts.text: Please deploy me a new Worker with an example durable object.

prompts.name: Query D1 Database
prompts.description: Get information about data in a D1 database
prompts.text: Can you tell me about the data in my D1 database named '...'?

prompts.name: Copy KV to R2
prompts.description: Copy entries from a KV namespace to an R2 bucket
prompts.text: Can you copy all the entries from my KV namespace '...' into my R2 bucket '...'?
